FuncDef: This command monitors statistics for an SDP binding associated with this service.
CLIs: sdp { <sdp-id> [ <:vc-id> ] | far-end <ip-address> } [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SDP identifier. Values-sdp-id: 1 to 17407.
Specifies the system address of the far-end router for the SDP in dotted decimal notation. The string may be up to 32 characters.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays absolute rate-per-second value for each statistic.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
